attributes.action: Send a clear message to Talibans to allow Afghan girls to get educated.
attributes.additional_details: This will help to stabilise our afghan to stay in Afghanistan and get educated. Everyday hundreds of afghans are leaving Afghanistan 🇦🇫 and taking refuge to different countries. Afghan people have enough of stupid Talibans. UK and USA have left Afghans at the hands of evil Talibans.
attributes.background: Hold Talibans accountable for the Hostage behaviour and let them know that the world 🌎 will not close their eyes on Afghanistan 🇦🇫. Girls have the right to get educated. Education is the way forward to brighter future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
